explanation: To place the red cube on top of the blue cube, the robotic arm first grasps the red cube from its initial position on pad_two. After grasping the red cube, the arm returns to the home position. Then, it places the red cube directly on top of the blue cube, which is already on top of the green cube. Finally, the arm returns to the home position to complete the task.
prompt: Place the red cube on top of the blue cube
